1: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בְּהַעֲל֤וֹת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>would take up</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <sup>452 </sup> <n>Elijah</n> בַּֽסְעָרָ֖ה <sup>5591 </sup> <n>by a whirlwind</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>into heaven</n> וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> אֵלִיָּ֛הוּ <sup>452 </sup> <n>that Elijah</n> וֶאֱלִישָׁ֖ע <sup>477 </sup> <n>with Elisha</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <sup>1537 </sup> <n>from Gilgal</n>
